Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides safe, supportive accommodation for young women aged between 16 and 25 years who are survivors of sexual abuse or violence. Women who are pregnant and/or with dependent children may also be referred. There is a core house with 4 beds, 5 single person furnished flats (one of which is adapted for disabled access), 2 furnished maisonettes and 2 houses for women with children. Runs theraputic activities and workshops, allotment sessions and a parents group. Continues to provide support for women after they move on. Referrals can be made by the young women themselves, a worker or a friend. The service is also available to young women from other parts of the country. Cannot provide direct access.
